item.title: Announcing TypeScript 5.3 - TypeScript
item.description: Today we’re excited to announce the release of TypeScript 5.3! If you’re not familiar with TypeScript, it’s a language that adds type syntax to JavaScript to bring type-checking. Type-checking can catch all sorts of issues like typos and forgetting to check for null and undefined.

item.title: Migrating Page Navigation Apps from Xamarin Forms
item.description: Learn about common pitfalls and practical solutions for migrating Xamarin Forms page navigation to Uno Platform. Dive into Xamarin Forms' NavigationPage and Uno's Frame control, comparing navigation patterns, hardware button integration, and adding a NavigationBar. Discover effective page-specific navigation, transition animations, and essential considerations for thread safety.
item.author: (Uno Platform Team)

item.title: Microsoft Canada - Calgary Automation and Integration Day
item.description: Join Microsoft and our Partners (MNP &amp; Horton Cloud) for a day to dive into the latest product announcements, customer stories and enablement of our Power Automate &amp; &nbsp;Azure Integration Services capabilities. &nbsp;You will hear from Microsoft Product Management Teams discussing the latest capabilities and future roadmap and strategy along with stories from local customers and partners.&nbsp;Note: This is an in-person event only being held at the Microsoft Calgary office. Please register to secure your spot for this event. &nbsp;Due to limited seating, we may not be able to accommodate all requests to attend.&nbsp;&nbsp;Azure Automation &amp; Integration Day Objectives: &nbsp;Drive awareness of new features/capabilities launched at IgniteLearn from existing customers as they share their experiences deploying and realizing value from using Azure automation and integration technologiesExpand and connect the local automation &amp; integration communityLearn from partners on their capabilities and offerings in the market&nbsp;Azure Automation &amp; Integration Agenda: &nbsp;8:45 am - Welcome9:00 am – Power Automate, Process Mining &amp; Azure Logic Apps Keynote &nbsp;10:00 am – Customer Show Case &nbsp;11:00 am – Partner Show Case &nbsp;12:00 pm – Lunch &amp; Networking &nbsp;(Lunch will be provided)1:00 pm – Breakout #1 - Logic Apps Ignite Announcements &nbsp;1:00 pm – Breakout #2 – Power Automate and Process Mining Ignite Announcements &nbsp;2:00 pm – Closing Remarks &nbsp;2:15 pm – Event Close and Networking&nbsp;Note: This is an in-person event only being held at the Microsoft Calgary office. Please register to secure your spot for this event. Due to limited seating, we may not be able to accommodate all requests to attend.Microsoft Calgary110 - 9th Avenue SW7th Floor (Suite 710)Calgary, ABT2P 0T1&nbsp;If you have any questions about this event, please email kent.weare@microsoft.com.&nbsp;To learn how to manage your contact preferences for other parts of Microsoft, please read our&nbsp;Privacy&nbsp;Statement.Microsoft Corporation, One Microsoft Way, Redmond, WA 98052 USA&nbsp;

item.title: Back up your Bitwarden vault in a future-proof and secure way
item.description: Introduction Your Bitwarden vault contains (hopefully) all of your passwords and other sensitive data, so it would be good to have a backup of it in case something goes wrong. In this post, we will explore how to export your Bitwarden data, keep it safely encrypted with PGP, and set and complete backup reminders using Todoist. Prerequisites Bitwarden account PGP key pair (optional but recommended) Todoist account and API key (optional) Bitwarden CLI setup Downloading and installing Bitwarden CLI The Bitwarden CLI tool is available for download on the Bitwarden website.
item.author: (David Isaksson)

item.title: Data-Driven Development is a Lie
item.description: In the Clojure community, people often discuss such things as data-driven development. It is like you don’t write any code or logic. Instead, you declare data structures, primarily maps, and whoosh: there is a kind of Deus ex Machina that evaluates these maps and does the stuff.

item.description: Microsoft released .NET 8 last week, one of the most notable news within the launch was .NET Aspire.
